## Government Tender Announcement

### Solicitation Information

**Solicitation Number:** WS4228364119
**Solicitation Title:** DOC4271940126 - Rebuild and Reinstall Transmission for Toromont Caterpillar Loader
**Solicitation Description:** The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to submit proposals for the services of a Red Seal Certified Heavy Duty Equipment Technician or Red Seal Certified Diesel Engine Mechanic to remove, rebuild, rebearing, reseal, and reinstall the transmission on a Toromont Caterpillar loader.
**Bidder Eligibility:** This solicitation is open to all eligible bidders. The successful bidder must provide for all equipment, parts, and labour necessary to complete the transmission rebuild to manufacturer specifications by December 20, 2023.
**Tender Status:** Expired.

### Tender Details

**Closing Date:** November 7th, 2023, at 14:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
**Description:** The bidders are requested to submit their bid in accordance with the requirements listed in the solicitation document. The bid submission must include all supporting documentation required, and the submission must be made by the closing date and time.

### Special Conditions

**Amendment Notice:** Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. The bid submission must be made by November 7th, 2023, at 14:00 (Eastern Standard Time).
**Anonymous or Late Submissions:** Submissions made after the closing time will be deemed non-responsive.
**Notice of Contract Award:** The government reserves the right to award the contract to the bidder who submitted the winning bid. Any discrepancies in the bid submission will result in the bid being declared non-compliant.
